 2025-00392025-01-24IRCC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of LLOYD MATTHEW RICHARDS of Toronto, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective March 27, 2025.
AttachmentsAttachment
